website_summaries.verdict: The XYZprinting Nobel 1.0 3D Printer is a fun novelty that is too expensive to be practical in the long run.
pros: The XYZprinting Nobel 1.0 3D Printer produces highly detailed and complex 3D objects
The compact printer costs significantly less than others that use the same technology and requires little time to set up and operate
cons: The printer and the consumables it uses are expensive
The print process is slow and, due to the nature of the consumables, can be messy

customer_reviews.title: I never review product I purchase on Amazon but this ...
customer_reviews.text: I never review product I purchase on Amazon but this time I must! Warning!!! DO NOT BUY THIS OR ANY XYZ PRINTING PRODUCT! I purchased this printer in Sept of 2016. Now only 4 months later it is broken. The resin tank motor is broken. XYZ Printing says it is covered under warranty but I have to pay over $100 in shipping ( the printer is heavy) to send it to them to fix it. This is the second printer I purchased from them and both have broken within 6 months of purchase under light use! Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie A.

customer_reviews.title: "XYZPRINTING" message, BRAND NEW, Won't Initialize
customer_reviews.text: The printer just arrived today. I carefully removed it from the box, plugged it in, and turned it on. The display message reads, "XYZPRINTING" and will not move past that screen. My brand new printer arrived unusable. I've read that others have had the same issue. If anyone has a solution, please let me know. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOA - Three times
customer_reviews.text: The first one didn't work. We received a replacement. The second one didn't work. We received a replacement. Thought we'd go for the third charm. It was also DOA. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: SnowDogs

customer_reviews.title: Terrible execution
customer_reviews.text: I have fought with this product for over 2 years on various random projects, never has it produced something useful. First, the parts would slip from the top of the base plate, had to manually rough up the plate, still not sticking well. Then parts started sticking to the bottom of the tray (suppose to stick to the top). Updated the software/firmware, I get too many error codes. Takes WAY to long for the software to process the sliced models. 20 hours to print a 2-3" item. At this point I'd rather start fresh with a new printer than continue fighting with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt P.

customer_reviews.title: and a fantastic price. I bout mine a few weeks ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely precise, highly improved software, and a fantastic price. I bout mine a few weeks ago and have had no issues. My only complaint is the limited resin selection. It only allows proprietary bottles..
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and can produce extremely impressive prints.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second SLA style resin printer up from a kit built DIY style. This is one of the easier to use SLA printers and key features like resin tank auto filling are extremely innovative. With a modular resin tank, this is extremely user friendly. I am especially impressed with the clear resin prints.
customer_reviews.author: Jetguy

customer_reviews.title: Initialization problem
customer_reviews.text: When trying to use the printer for the first time it is not initialized and nothing can be done to solve it. This problem was reported by several people so it is not unusual. I am very unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.author: hcroxatto

customer_reviews.title: Buy silicone replacement from fun to do and the printer is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Second vat silicone change in two months, not enough troubleshooting for this printer. All in all great printer; bigger then expected.
customer_reviews.author: M.wht

customer_reviews.title: The on word XYZprinting screen appears and I can not ...
customer_reviews.text: The on word XYZprinting screen appears and I can not change it What is the problem ? Please Help me Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Hisham 3rifi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer for the price. Out of the box I had it printing and haven't looked back. I am currently using it to make a chess set from scans taken at a museum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Benner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the printer
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it had better resolution and the recin could work for casting. The software crashed many times on Windows as well Mac. I spoke with XYZ customer service representative about my problems........ There was NO help on the issues. I sent it back yo Amazon. Quite disappointed with the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Jose F. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The item was completely broken, and the Free resin was missing.
customer_reviews.author: juan carlos

customer_reviews.title: but for me the quality of the prints so far have been great. Had to make a few calibrations to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this printer for a lot of small prints and a few larger prints, but for me the quality of the prints so far have been great. Had to make a few calibrations to get it back straight, but now all is good. I have not had a bad print since.
customer_reviews.author: mgriffin

customer_reviews.title: Detailed prints (25 microns). Very quiet,
customer_reviews.text: Love this 3d printer, Very detailed prints (25 microns). Very quiet,
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible printer. It didn't work and Ithe came in a ghetto box set up even the delivery guy couldn't belive how badly boxed it was. Resin got everywhere and the uv protection cover was broken. I work on 3d printers for a living and have never seen one come out of the box broken like this one was.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bullis

customer_reviews.title: Great Resoultion, slicing takes long periods of time for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Resoultion, slicing takes long periods of time for large objects. My printer arrived with the UV case broken, Great machine for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: I can't belive it. it's really simple to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't belive it. it's really simple to use. plug and play. It took me 5 minutes after unboxing to start my first print. Congrats XYZ!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Bordenave

customer_reviews.title: Was having bad prints (not sticking
customer_reviews.text: Was having bad prints (not sticking, wavy structure) but just figured out it was because I needed to tighten the big knob that secures the build plate. Pretty obvious now, but the instructions only mention using that knob to remove the build plate. Before now, I didn't have to remove the build plate because the objects were barely sticking to it. Anyway, I think I have it figured out now. BTW: It came with a USB stick with some samples, but not the Eifel tower. The ones I could download from the internet did not slice correctly. XYZ support gave me their model though after I complained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No print fails at all and the print end up looking amazing. its not a 30
customer_reviews.text: this product is rock solid. if you know 3d printing , this will be a dream to use. If your a novice , get some skills with a filament extruder machine first then you wont complain anymore when you use this. No print fails at all and the print end up looking amazing. its not a 30,000 dollar machine but it does the same exact thing .
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRITNER!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this printer is amazing. The prints come out very well. Little grainy sometimes but you get what you pay for. Pros. Cheap for SLA printer Good prints Cons. Noisy when resin tray moves during print Have to use there resin (nfc tag on bottel) Have to use meshmixer to hollow objects if you want to save on resin Kinda slow, not sure if its this machine or all SLA printer Use to FDM style
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very poor instructions. Product had minor damage on an internal ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor instructions. Product had minor damage on an internal well packed part. We tried two different times to help it print as directed with no results, not even a hint of sample formation. Great price but I guess you always get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: hydrosentry

customer_reviews.title: Lid in a bad way
customer_reviews.text: This 3d printer arrived with its lid where you could see cracks and a bad support, what it means to me "repaired". I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Morales

customer_reviews.title: Hi guys, I will buy used Nobel SLA over ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys, I will buy used Nobel SLA over EU, please send pictures and request. Reason is we rewrote sw and fixed laser/galvo issues and made castable and ceramic resins. Thanks, gatto at gatto dot com.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: NO RETURN/ NO REFUND. The machine I have has yet to print anything usable, it makes a loud metal slapping sound, and the parts fall into the vat during printing and become lumps of resin. Talked to tech support for a week before trying to return it, when I did they said, NO RETURN/ NO REFUND on used machines. How was I to know it was junk until I used it? now they wont take back a faulty machine, and I'm stuck with an expensive hunk of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mazin Dajani

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: Great home based printer and I’ve been able to make a little money with it. There were a few things to learn but overall the setup and software install was easy. The slicer is a bit cumbersome when trying to export with supports but patience has been key.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost SLA printer can now use OPEN RESIN PRINT - USE MAKERJUICE or other lower costs resins!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from eBay. The new firmware allows you to print with MakerJuice (lower cost resins) You will have to manually fill the vat tray, but it works great. If you are looking to get a low-cost SLA printer...this printer is absolutely awesome. It is really well built. Love it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Not Open!
customer_reviews.text: This printer tries to pretend it's "open" by claiming to be "open fillament" but the printer doesn't have an open source slicer or publically documented interface protocol.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Patrick Nicholl

customer_reviews.title: Really good printer, great print quality and the price is ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good printer, great print quality and the price is only about half of other SLA machine. The best part of Nobel is you can detach model from print platform very easily, I have never used any 3d printer can remove part more easily than this one. I just printed Empire State Building, very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Bo. P

customer_reviews.title: I am so amazed that i can buy a SLA 3D printer for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed prints made from this printer! I am so amazed that i can buy a SLA 3D printer for the price of printers from other brands. The prints are fantastic, and other printers that I own could not produce anything close. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Peng

customer_reviews.title: Wow, not even trying to pretend this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, not even trying to pretend this is a direct knock off of the Formlabs printers. I looks almost exactly the same. Could have put a little more work into making it look different. Same factory?
customer_reviews.author: LABroosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product, Garbage manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product, Garbage manufacturing. I received 2 DOA printers and was finally refunded. I don't know how good this seller is, but the product is straight trash.
customer_reviews.author: jeff r

product_meta.title: [Open Resin] XYZprinting Nobel 1.0 SLA 3D Printer (Included FREE Resin, FREE Printing Platform & Tank)
feature_bullets: Uses advanced stereo lithography 3D printing technology
Cures Photopolymer resin using UV lasers
Can print in 25, 50, and 100 micron resolution. Display: 2.6 Inches FSTN LCM

Includes Nobel 1.0 3D printer, scraper, gloves, USB flash Drive, Rinse Basket, USB Wire, resin tank, Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide, Nozzle cap and tube, XYZware Nobel Software, and one 500ml bottle of XYZprinting CLEAR photopolymer resin.Stardard VGA driver on operating system, or a graphics card doesn't support OpenGL 2.1

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
